Acabo de terminar Portal en alrededor 3 horas (MODO HISTORIA).


Portal se trata de una chica con la cual "experimentan" por as√≠ decirlo, esta chica (obviamente nosotros) pasa por pruebas usando portales pero poco a poco nos damos cuenta que este lugar de experimentos no es del todo como nos lo muestran.

La historia, a pesar de ser un poco simple, es interesante, l√°stima que esta concluye en un plazo de 3 horas (al menos en mi caso), pero este "modo historia" contiene niveles f√°ciles tirando a complicado, en los cuales te divertir√°s haciendo portales y pasando en ellos, porque a pesar de sonar simple, son divertidos.

Hay un modo de mapas de bonificaci√≥n que todav√≠a no jugu√© pero seguro lo hago, en eso parece haber contrarreloj y niveles.
EDIT: Son los mismos niveles pero m√°s complicados

Este juego, como ya dije, es corto pero disfrutable, as√≠ que recomiendo comprarlo junto al Portal 2, m√°s ahora que est√° en oferta (30/6).
It's Portal. What did you expect. Of course it's good. Just buy it.

Titolo interessante. Gli enigmi non sono difficilissimi e una volta capite le dinamiche, superare le varie fasi diventa un gioco da ragazzi. Nonostante sia abbastanza breve, i 19 livelli pi√π boss lo rendono un gioco dalla durata media. 

In realt√†, credo che dipenda molto dall'abilita del giocatore il fatto che possa o meno risultare estenuante o tutto il contrario.

Occorer√† munirsi di logica, abilit√† e riflessi pronti perch√® molte task saranno a tempo, quindi diventa necessario osservare bene lo scenario ed agire con criterio. Proseguir√≤ sicuramente con il secondo capitolo e magari guardando a ritroso, avr√≤ persino voglia delle challenge bonus.

The game (story not any bonus maps) itself is rather short although i haven't finished it yet im already in Level 18/19 but i think because of the bonus maps you could end up playing this game more. Graphics is decent now yes everything looks rather good but compared to Half Life 2 (same engine) it's not that impressive (idk maybe i shouldn't compare these 2 games in terms of graphics). Gameplay/controls are good just that hate that when you go everywhere it's so slippery but the rest is amazing. This game is not actually that difficult i could just figure it out by myself for most of the game, I think that until the 2 last levels you wouldn't have any difficulty issues there. Now first i playing this on a MBP15-late 2013 and a mechanical HDD and this might not be for everyone but first The game loading time is rather long, for me it can take around 3-5secs of waiting when going to a new level and sometimes it's just temporary freezes though like i said i playing on 8year old, extremally used hardware so yeah i wouldn't stop anyone from playing the game because i have minor issues. This game is amazing and i would recommend it for anyone.

If you haven't played this game yet, you should.

This game is an adventure and is worth your money. The puzzles in this game are one of the few that had me thinking for 15+ minutes. There is a harmony between mentally stimulating puzzles and the easier ones. Completing the puzzles always gave me a sense of gratitude even if I finished them quite quickly. The graphical fidelity isn't extraordinary which is perfectly reasonable of its age, and even if it isn't the greatest it doesn't directly interfere with ease of play. The plot is definitely something. My only 2 problems with the game is the movement and the replay-ability, Which both aren't direct interference from the quality of the game. They just have subtle degrading factors.
3-4 hours of play time. this game is one of the best games i've played so far. worth the money
